value:
This is the garb of an arch sage of
Tellius. Supposedly it bolsters the
wearer's magic.

The vicious cycle of abuse and hatred
will continue for as long as there are
those willing to perpetuate it.

Ike spoke to me of Askr's future.
I suppose that means this place
must have at least some value.

I calculate what is necessary to
achieve victory—no more, no less.

I've heard a great deal of the tactical
prowess of Robin of Ylisse. Someone
I should consult with, perhaps...

I've come to deliver a personal letter
from $Nf.$k$pYou're $Nu?
Great. Here.

I will not rest until Ike's vision for the
world has become a reality.

No need to get excited. Victory was
a foregone conclusion.

I won't waste time dwelling on a
failed strategy. Let's just revise
and move forward.

Excellent—more tactical options. I will
make good use of this.

I'm here to support Ike, commander
of the Greil Mercenaries.

Let me make one thing absolutely
clear to you, $Nu.$k$pI am not aiding the Order of Heroes
out of any concern for its future
or its people.$k$pI am merely following Ike's lead—and
he has placed his trust in you, for the
time being.$k$pSo, if I were you, I would take great
care to honor that trust in good faith.$k$pThat said, for as long as Ike continues
to find your cause worthy...$k$pYou will have my full support. I give
you my word on that.
No quarter.
One less threat.
Just give up.
Weaker than expected.
Miscalculated...
Yay...
Fancy clothing won't disguise a lack of substance.
Be reasonable. I have things to do.
My place will always be at Ike's side—regardless of what people want.
You're staring at me. I dislike it.

At least there are some knowledgeable mages
to learn from here. I guess that's something.
Wherever my work calls me, my objective will always be the same.
I suppose I've developed some genuine interest in supporting you.
Let's begin.
Decide.
I'll settle this.
